mapper.select: select * from mh_menu order by menu_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into mh_menu values( (select max(menu_id)+1 from mh_menu), #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{menu_image}, #{menu_category}, #{menu_detail} )
mapper.update: update mh_menu set menu_name=#{menu_name}, menu_price=#{menu_price}, menu_image=#{menu_image}, menu_category=#{menu_category}, menu_detail=#{menu_detail} where menu_id=#{menu_id}
mapper.select: select * from mh_menu where menu_category=#{menu_category} order by menu_id desc
select menu_result from mh_recommendation where cus_id=#{cus_id}
